summary: Frontend UI testing completed for MedMentor v2.0 - All 9 improvement features verified. Login, Signup with form validation, Profile with dark mode toggle, About page, History with filters, Chat EmptyState, Conversation with SOAP button, and Custom Splash Screen all working correctly. App is a React Native Expo web app.

ui_bugs.issue: ngrok tunnel connection is intermittent - app returns 520 error approximately 40% of requests. Service restarts frequently.

issues: shadow* style props deprecated warning - should use boxShadow
Invalid flex property '1 1 300px' - only single values supported
useNativeDriver not supported warning for animations

action_items: INFRASTRUCTURE: Investigate ngrok tunnel stability - expo service keeps restarting with 'ngrok tunnel took too long to connect' error
LOW: Fix deprecated style warnings for shadow*, flex, and pointerEvents
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes are properly implemented on interactive elements
Dark mode ThemeContext properly uses AsyncStorage for persistence
Form validation in signup is comprehensive with email format check, password strength, confirm password match
EmptyState component is reusable with proper props for customization
SOAP PDF export uses window.print() for web platform - may want to consider a proper PDF generation library for better formatting
context_for_next_testing_agent: This is a React Native Expo app running as web. The app URL is https://medmentor-qa-env.preview.emergentagent.com. The ngrok tunnel is unstable - if you get 520 errors, retry or wait for the expo service to restart. All major features are functional: Login, Signup with PasswordStrength component, Profile with dark mode toggle, About page with Terms/Privacy, History with date/mentor filters and EmptyState, Chat with EmptyState, Conversation with SOAP button and PDF export. Test user: doctor@example.com / password123

elements_verified: Funcionalidades list (Consultas com IA, Resumo SOAP, Transcricao por Voz, Pesquisa Universal, Dashboard Impactometro)
Date filter chips (Todas, Hoje, Semana, Mes)
Conversation cards with mentor name, title, preview, date
EmptyState when no results match filter
EmptyState with helpful message for new chats
Message input with mic and send

dark_mode.notes: Toggle visible in Profile page, AsyncStorage persistence implemented in code
